name: Minecraft Jam Game
description:
My submission for the Minecraft in 24 Hours jam: https://itch.io/jam/minecraft-in-24-hours

Blocks can only be removed, not added. Collisions are very basic. Run into a wall to jump to the top block.

Controls

WASD/ZQSD: move
Space: remove the block that you're standing on
Alt+Enter: toggle fullscreen
